muchart 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Generate random samples from a normal distribution

    r_n.Rd

    Generate random samples from a normal distribution

    Usage

    r_n(lots, n, mu, sd)

    Arguments

    lots

    The number of lots to generate

    n

    The sample size

    mu

    The mean of the distribution

    sd

    The standard deviation of the distribution

    Value

    A matrix of random samples

    Examples

    r_n(lots = 100, n = 10, mu = 0, sd = 1)
#>                  n_1         n_2          n_3          n_4         n_5
